Cli Tool

Posted by Voleking on April 28, 2016

CLI Tools

productive

  • autojump Smartly jump to your frequently used dirs

Themes

  • pure Pure theme for zsh
  • tomorrow The precursor to Base16 Theme
  • solarized Precision color scheme for multiple applications
  • Smyck Color Scheme for Terminal.app, iTerm2, Vim, MacVim, Sublime Text2 and Textmate
  • Flat UI Flat UI colors for Terminal and iTerm
  • Ocean An OS X Terminal.app profile based on the base16 Ocean theme
